gql_ug_test_large_query.query: query ($id: UUID!) { groupById(id: $id) { id name roles { user { id name surname email } roletype { id name } } subgroups { id name } memberships { user { id name } } } }

gql_ug_v2.query: query ($groupByIdId: UUID!) { groupById(id: $groupByIdId) { memberships { user { id } } id } }

user_insert.query: mutation($name: String!) { userInsert(user: { name: $name }){ id msg user { id name lastchange } } }
